mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad401_tbl ( ad401title, ad401content, ad401_subtitle1, ad401_subcontent1, ad401_subtitle2, ad401_subcontent2, ad401_subtitle3, ad401_subcontent3 ) VALUES ( #{ad401title}, #{ad401content}, #{ad401_subtitle1}, #{ad401_subcontent1}, #{ad401_subtitle2}, #{ad401_subcontent2}, #{ad401_subtitle3}, #{ad401_subcontent3} )
